page.title: 05SCHOOL SURVEY 1
page.content: Walkhampton has one small{primary {school}with three full time teachers. It was founded in l7l7 by Lady Modyford and is a Church of England voluntary school. We surveyed 15 children in the top class, of nine to eleven year olds. 1. "Where were you{living}in 1981?" -About 40% were living in Walkhampton, 20% were living outside the W. Devon area, 40% were living nearby. 2. "Where do you{live now?"} -Of the 15 children, 5 live in Walkhampton, 4 in Dousland, 1 in Horrabridge and 1 in Yelverton. 3. "Would you prefer to live somewhere else?" - 2 of the 15 children would have {preferred}to live somewhere else.One wanted to live in Brookside,the television soap opera village. The rest were happy where they were.
